TopicTitle: Is there a new deltaV map? The old one disappeared off the wiki. (answered: Got moved apparently)

Articles.Content:
What the title says. I'm just wondering this since the old one no longer exists apparently.

Edited May 6, 2015 by smjjames
Oh thanks, must have gotten moved from the page that I had bookmarked, didn't know where it went.

That's very wrong for atmosphere launch Dv now. I read a thread where, instead of 4550, someone got into LKO with 2880Dv (in 1.0).

I know things are a little more draggy with 1.0.2 but still nowhere near 4550.

That's very wrong for atmosphere launch Dv now. I read a thread where, instead of 4550, someone got into LKO with 2880Dv (in 1.0).

I know things are a little more draggy with 1.0.2 but still nowhere near 4550.

I realize that it's very wrong for atmosphere, I'm just using it as a general guide for interplanetary travel, plus I'm used to FAR.

If theres an updated subway style map, then cool. Someone should make one anyway.

I find that the little Android app "KSP Calculator" works pretty well. Still needs updating for the new aero but i sue it all the time for interplanetary requirements nad take off/landing with not atmosphere.
